ca.corefacility.gview.style.datastyle

Interface FeatureContainerStyle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PropertyMappable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeatureHolderStyle, SlotStyle

    public interface FeatureContainerStyle
extends PropertyMappable
    This allows for (data) styles that contain features, such as sets and slots, to interface more easily.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LabelStyle getLabelStyle() 
      boolean removePropertyStyleMapper()
      Removes the current property mapper from the feature container style.
      boolean removeSlotItemStyle(SlotItemStyle style)
      Remove the passed slot item style from the feature container.
